The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 January is 2,239,950 (3,979.5 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 28 December, there were 237,613 new confirmed cases (422.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 December, there were 213,709 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 11% (23,904 extra cases).
